description: The Vodka Lime Rickey is a spinoff of the traditional Bourbon Rickey. The “Rickey” was named after Joe Rickey, a Democratic lobbyist living in Washington, D.C., during the late 19th century. This cocktail had several versions, like the famous Gin Rickey and now, the Vodka Lime Rickey.This recipe is a revitalizing drink with a unique twist. The lime juice and carbonated water mix to make the perfect&nbsp;summer cocktail, or any time of year for that matter. This drink will cool you off on hot days and stimulate your senses when it's hot outside!
name: Vodka Lime Rickey
